entry.title: how i began to enjoy writing documentation
entry.content:
I find writing documentation to be a soul-sucking, tedious activity. And I was dragging my feet on getting started on my task at hand last week.

So, I spent a few hours setting up jekyll-bootstrap on my test machine, and now I get to play with a new (to me) technology and language (markup) instead of daydreaming whilst documenting away!

Plus, I love sublime text 2’s support for sftp and markdown (along with so many more technologies)

entry.title: A Math Love Haiku to My Missus
entry.content:
I posted a math haiku for the missus :

What is your sine, girl?

It’s π divided by 2

‘Cause you are the 1

<3

(because sin(π/2) = 1)

entry.title: haldo
entry.content:
People of Earth. How are you?

I really have nothing to say on a blog. I just wanted to see how difficult it was to install ruby, rvm, jekyll and octopress and then CNAME github to a custom subdomain.

Not certain I like the fact that I lost my CNAME this a.m. And then had to recompile octopress.

Nor am I certain that I have the whole git push to https://github.com/swimdrewid/swimdrewid.github.com down.

But, at least I got this far!
